original_title: Shura City: A Proposal for Anti-Drone Architecture
overview: Collaboration with Asher Kohn and 유+웃 CHAiT. In response to drone attacks and unlawful use of surveillance, a proposed city, Shura City, exists as an alternative city-state model. The polity’s citizens through collective decision-making are able to live free of intrusion by state forces and enable us to think about the value of security and privacy.
title: Shura City: A Proposal for Anti-Drone Architecture
